mapper.select: SELECT r.subject_approve_no ,sa.subject_no,s.subject_name,sa.professor_no,p.professor_name,sa.year,t.test_name,sa.semester FROM register r LEFT JOIN subject_approve sa ON r.subject_approve_no = sa.subject_approve_no LEFT JOIN subject s ON s.subject_no = sa.subject_no LEFT JOIN professor p ON p.professor_no = sa.professor_no LEFT JOIN test t ON t.subject_approve_no = sa.subject_approve_no WHERE student_no = #{studentNo}

SELECT t.test_no,sa.subject_no,s.subject_name,sa.year,sa.semester FROM subject_approve sa LEFT JOIN subject s ON sa.subject_no = s.subject_no LEFT JOIN test t ON a.subject_approve_no = t.subject_approve_no WHERE t.test_no = #{testNo}

SELECT s.subject_approve_no,s.major_no,s.subject_no,s.professor_no,s.YEAR,s.semester,s.start_date,s.end_date,s.total_date, m.major_name,p.professor_name,j.subject_name FROM subject_approve s LEFT JOIN major m ON s.major_no = m.major_no LEFT JOIN professor p ON s.professor_no = p.professor_no LEFT JOIN subject j ON j.subject_no = s.subject_no ORDER BY major_name ASC

SELECT s.subject_approve_no,s.major_no,s.subject_no,s.professor_no,s.YEAR,s.semester,s.start_date,s.end_date,s.total_date, m.major_name,p.professor_name,j.subject_name FROM subject_approve s LEFT JOIN major m ON s.major_no = m.major_no LEFT JOIN professor p ON s.professor_no = p.professor_no LEFT JOIN subject j ON j.subject_no = s.subject_no WHERE subject_approve_no = #{subjectApproveNo}
